name: Daniel Louis PILGRIM, Petitioner v. Ms. Kimberly A. BARKLEY, Board Secretary and the Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Respondents

parties: Daniel Louis PILGRIM, Petitioner v. Ms. Kimberly A. BARKLEY, Board Secretary and the Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 13th day of October, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
123 A.3d 1060
Daniel Louis PILGRIM, Petitioner v. Ms. Kimberly A. BARKLEY, Board Secretary and the Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Respondents.
No. 118 MM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 13, 2015.
